name: places/ChIJk6lmzxhawokRRvGgKv8ejNU
formattedAddress: Boss Tweeds, 41 Murray St, New York, NY 10007, USA
adrFormatAddress: Boss Tweeds, 41 Murray St, New York, NY 10007, USA

editorialSummary.text: Up-&-coming comedians perform in a cozy, relaxed nightspot offering bar food, beer & cocktails.

originalText.text:
My three star rating goes mostly to the venue / Bar.
A cool industrial decor with exposed brick and pipes with Edison light bulbs.
I pad menu which I found it impressive.
Two drink minimal order. Friendly staff.
The show was good I have to say. They are the sister twin of Tribeca comedy club and most comedians were the same. There were still good talents but the headliner at the end Adam Strauss was giving a life story speech, not much jokes and I sat till the end to see where it's going. He should work well on his material. Didn't like it.
Not going to this place (for comedy) but the bar is cool

originalText.text: Cozy comedy club with good talent, and decent drinks and food. The burgers were tasty, albeit a bit overcooked, and the fries were lukewarm. Definitely one of the better shows we have seen, would definitely return! They will be performing another show on 12/30 and two shows on New Year's Eve. As with other venues there is a two drink minimum, alcoholic or non alcoholic.

originalText.text: It was ok. It's a neat little basement bar/restaurant. I wasn't super Impressed by the food- it's what you expect for bar food. There were a few good comedians the night I went which made it overall a good night. There is a two drink per person minimum here.

text.text: It was ok. It's a neat little basement bar/restaurant. I wasn't super Impressed by the food- it's what you expect for bar food. There were a few good comedians the night I went which made it overall a good night. There is a two drink per person minimum here.

originalText.text: Stand up Comedy, below a bar. Funny comics! , small but interesting space with a limited food menue( got wings and frickels! Which were on par for a comedy club apps I'd get them again).  2 drink minium isn't bad when they have 7$ beers usually end up having more anyways.  I got a groupon which was also cool

Which were on par for a comedy club apps I'd get them again).  2 drink minium isn't bad when they have 7$ beers usually end up having more anyways.  I got a groupon which was also cool

originalText.text:
Don't know if it was our luck, but show tonight sucked. Jokes were mediocre and last performer Adam Strauss was just depressing, forget about being funny, he was like a lost philosopher who is deeply suicidal. Mind you I love dark humor, sarcasm and self-deprecation, but this guy completely missed the mark. The only guy who was worth listening to was a cute guy, forgot his name, but he was good, not super good, just good.
My cocktail was fine, but my friend said that her Stella beer was disgusting, maybe their draft beer went bad or something (not even sure if beer can go bad). Overall, not a great experience.
